column1: Kata Robata////The atmosphere here feels business-casual but just don't come directly after the gym and you'll be fine. It's medium-lit here
column2: not as dim as a steakhouse
column3: just a little brighter than that.Oftentimes you will see a lot of business dinners here so it isn't always an intimate setting. The staff here are all extremely kind
column4: they were very helpful in identifying each piece of fish and ensuring they describe the plates as they were served.
